summary: The arrival of the telegraph put Pony Express riders like John Blair and his pal Smoky out of work. A race will decide whether they or stageline owner Drake get the government mail contract.

Frank|Jack Rockwell|Arthur Millett|Tracy Layne|Bobby Burns|Yakima Canutt|Horace B. Carpenter|Helen Gibson|Herman Hack|Henry Hall|Lloyd Ingraham|Jack Ingram|Cliff Lyons|Clyde McClary|Art Mix|George Morrell|Bud Pope|Arthur Thalasso|Francis Walker|Joe Yrigoyen
keywords: cowboy cowboy relationship|stagecoach race|mail contract|poisoned water|telegraph line
